tool.name: qiime2 phylogeny robinson-foulds
tool.description: Calculate Robinson-Foulds distance between phylogenetic trees.

param.name: trees
param.label: trees: List[Phylogeny[Rooted | Unrooted]]
param.help: [required] Phylogenetic trees to compare with Robinson-Foulds. Rooting information and branch lengths are ignored by this metric.

repeat.name: labels
repeat.help: [optional] Labels to use for the tree names in the distance matrix. If ommited, labels will be "tree_n" where "n" ranges from 1..N. The number of labels must match the number of trees.
repeat.title: labels: List[Str]

param.name: element
param.label: element: Str
param.validator: value is not None and len(value) > 0

tool.help:
QIIME 2: phylogeny robinson-foulds ================================== Calculate Robinson-Foulds distance between phylogenetic trees.
Outputs: -------- :distance_matrix.qza: The distances between trees as a symmetric matrix.
|
Description: ------------ Calculate the Robinson-Foulds symmetric difference metric between two or more phylogenetic trees.
|
